mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id , u.email , u.password , u.birthday , u.nickname , u.gender , u.signup_date , f.src_url as src_url FROM USER u LEFT JOIN FILE f ON u.user_id = f.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{user_id} AND f.type = 'profile';

SELECT p.post_id , m.mission_content , p.content , p.like_count , p.mission_id , p.written_datetime , u.nickname , DATE_FORMAT(m.mission_date, '%m월 %e일') AS missionDate , mt.theme_name AS pri_theme_name , st.theme_name AS sub_theme_name , e.emotion_name AS emotion_name , c.companion_type AS companion_type , f.src_url AS src_url FROM POST p LEFT JOIN MISSION m ON p.mission_id = m.mission_id LEFT JOIN THEME mt ON m.pri_theme_id = mt.theme_id LEFT JOIN THEME st ON m.sub_theme_id = st.theme_id LEFT JOIN EMOTION e ON p.emotion_id = e.emotion_id LEFT JOIN COMPANION c ON p.companion_id = c.companion_id LEFT JOIN USER u ON p.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN FILE f ON p.post_id = f.post_id WHERE u.user_id = #{user_id} AND f.type = 'post'
AND DATE_FORMAT( m.mission_date, '%e' ) = #{selectedDate}
